About.Hours & facilities: By appointment. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, photographs and newspapers. Referral to paid researchers is available.

About.Acquisition focus: To collect materials relating to South Australian history and museology for the provision of assistance with research, and general enquiries. Reference materials, books, photographs and newspaper clippings.

About.Major holdings: South Australia Lands Department: Glass plate negatives 1870s-1950s; Photographs 1860s- (14,000 items). Various: Photographs/negatives 1860s- (6,000 items). South Australia Parliamentary Papers: (Hansard) 1856- .

Contact.Street address: Torrens Parade Ground, Victoria Drive, Adelaide 5000

Contact.Note: Formally known as the State History Centre at 59 King William Street, Adelaide 5000
